name: quick-feet

effect.x_y: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

short_effect: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

flavor_text.x_y: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
